evidence.text: Expedited MOTION to Intervene Daniel W. Bower, Monte N Stewart appearing for Intervenor Defendant Speaker of the Idaho House of Representatives Scott Bedke, Idaho Senate President Pro Tempore Chuck Winder

extracted.value: Expedited Motion to Intervene filed by Daniel W. Bower (representing the Idaho Legislature) on August 8, 2022, asking the court to expedite the motion to intervene.

evidence.text: MOTION for Preliminary Injunction Lisa Newman appearing for Plaintiff United States of America. Responses due by 8/29/2022

extracted.value: Motion for Preliminary Injunction filed by Lisa Newman on behalf of the United States of America on August 8, 2022, asking the court to grant a preliminary injunction.

evidence.text: NOTICE by State of Idaho re 15 Expedited MOTION to Intervene State of Idaho's Non-Opposition (Larrondo, Megan)

extracted.value: Expedited Motion to Intervene filed by State of Idaho's Non‑Opposition (Larrondo, Megan) on August 10, 2022, requesting intervention in the case.
